price: Àyàfi àwọn tó ronú pìwàdà ṣíwájú kí ẹ tó lágbára lórí wọn. Nítorí náà, ẹ mọ̀ pé dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min qabli an taqdirū ʿalayhim fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
